numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a disparity between the proportion of head coaches of color and the proportion of players of color in the specified major sports leagues.
2. The proportion of head coaches of color is significantly lower than the proportion of players of color in these leagues.
3. In every league, less than 50% of the coaching staff are people of color.
4. In every league except baseball, more than 50% of the players are people of color.
5. MLS has the highest percentage of coaches of color.
6. MLS has the second-lowest percentage of players of color.
7. Therefore, MLS is not necessarily the most diverse league.
8. This information led me to believe that there is no direct correlation between player diversity and leadership diversity.
9. White Americans are the racial majority in the U.S.
10. Therefore, statistically, there are fewer people of color in the U.S.
11. I wonder why there is a significant disparity between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of coaches of color in every major sports league.
12. BLM is a movement.
13. More awareness is brought to BLM.
14. I wonder whether leadership diversity will increase in the years after this awareness increases.
15. It is especially important to highlight these racial injustices in communities like my own community.
16. My state is 94% white.
17. The system has racial inequities.
18. These racial inequities do not negatively impact the majority of my community.
19. This data validates what people of color in my community deal with daily.
20. This data also validates what people of color in the entire country deal with daily.
21. This graph compares the percentage of players of color with the percentage of head coaches of color in major U.S. sports leagues.
22. This graph shows the discrepancy between these percentages.
23. The headline is: Is the playing field really level for those who seek sports leadership?
